input.value:
fetch logs
| filter k8s.namespace.name=="kubearmor"
| filter k8s.deployment.name=="kubearmor-relay"
| parse log, "JSON:log_json"
| fieldsAdd nodename=log_json[HostName], podname=log_json[PodName], containername=log_json[ContainerName], process=log_json[ProcessName], action=log_json[Action],source=log_json[Source], operation=log_json[Operation], ressource=log_json[Resource],data=log_json[Data], type=log_json[Type], namespace=log_json[NamespaceName],result=log_json[Result]
| filter type != "ContainerLog"
| filter action=="Block"
| fieldsAdd tags=log_json[Tags], policy=log_json[PolicyName], enforcer=log_json[Enforcer], message=log_json[Message]
| summarize count(), by:{bin(timestamp,30s),namespace}

grail.canonicalQuery:
fetch logs
| filter k8s.namespace.name == "kubearmor"
| filter k8s.deployment.name == "kubearmor-relay"
| parse log, "JSON:log_json"
| fieldsAdd nodename = log_json[HostName], podname = log_json[PodName], containername = log_json[ContainerName], process = log_json[ProcessName], action = log_json[Action], source = log_json[Source], operation = log_json[Operation], ressource = log_json[Resource], data = log_json[Data], type = log_json[Type], namespace = log_json[NamespaceName], result = log_json[Result]
| filter type != "ContainerLog"
| filter action == "Block"
| fieldsAdd tags = log_json[Tags], policy = log_json[PolicyName], enforcer = log_json[Enforcer], message = log_json[Message]
| summarize by:{bin(timestamp, 30s), namespace}, count()

grail.canonicalQuery:
timeseries by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, cpu_usages = avg(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_usage)
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance], sourceField:dt.entity.cloud_application_instance, lookupField:id, fields:{entity.name}
| fieldsAdd cpu = arrayAvg(cpu_usages)
| filter startsWith(entity.name, "kubearmor-")
| fieldsRemove cpu_usages, dt.entity.cloud_application_instance

metrics.description: This metric measures the total CPU consumed (user usage + system usage) by container. The most detailed level of aggregation is container.

input.value:
timeseries result = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_usage, default:0, rollup:avg), nonempty:true, by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter: dt.entity.cloud_application_instance == "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-858172D5630AFDE7", from: -1h | fieldsAdd metricName = "Kubernetes: Container - CPU usage"
| append[timeseries result = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_throttled, default:0, rollup:avg), nonempty:true, by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter: dt.entity.cloud_application_instance == "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-858172D5630AFDE7", from: -1h | fieldsAdd metricName = "Kubernetes: Container - CPU throttled"]
| append[timeseries result = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.requests_cpu, rollup:avg), by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter: dt.entity.cloud_application_instance == "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-858172D5630AFDE7", from: -1h]
| append[timeseries result = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.limits_cpu, rollup:avg), by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter: dt.entity.cloud_application_instance == "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-858172D5630AFDE7", from: -1h]

grail.canonicalQuery:
timeseries by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter:dt.entity.cloud_application_instance == "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-858172D5630AFDE7", from:-1h, nonempty:TRUE, result = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_usage, rollup:avg, default:0)
| fieldsAdd metricName = "Kubernetes: Container - CPU usage"
| append 
	[
		timeseries by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter:dt.entity.cloud_application_instance == "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-858172D5630AFDE7", from:-1h, nonempty:TRUE, result = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_throttled, rollup:avg, default:0)
		| fieldsAdd metricName = "Kubernetes: Container - CPU throttled"
	]
| append [timeseries by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter:dt.entity.cloud_application_instance == "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-858172D5630AFDE7", from:-1h, result = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.requests_cpu, rollup:avg)]
| append [timeseries by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter:dt.entity.cloud_application_instance == "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-858172D5630AFDE7", from:-1h, result = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.limits_cpu, rollup:avg)]
grail.query:
timeseries result = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_usage, default:0, rollup:avg), nonempty:true, by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter: dt.entity.cloud_application_instance == "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-858172D5630AFDE7", from: -1h | fieldsAdd metricName = "Kubernetes: Container - CPU usage"
| append[timeseries result = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_throttled, default:0, rollup:avg), nonempty:true, by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter: dt.entity.cloud_application_instance == "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-858172D5630AFDE7", from: -1h | fieldsAdd metricName = "Kubernetes: Container - CPU throttled"]
| append[timeseries result = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.requests_cpu, rollup:avg), by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter: dt.entity.cloud_application_instance == "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-858172D5630AFDE7", from: -1h]
| append[timeseries result = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.limits_cpu, rollup:avg), by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter: dt.entity.cloud_application_instance == "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-858172D5630AFDE7", from: -1h]

metrics.description: This metric measures the total CPU consumed (user usage + system usage) by container. The most detailed level of aggregation is container.
This metric measures the total CPU throttling by container. The most detailed level of aggregation is container.
This metric measures the cpu requests. The most detailed level of aggregation is container. The value is the cpu requests of a container.
This metric measures the cpu limits. The most detailed level of aggregation is container. The value is the cpu limits of a container.

input.value:
timeseries result = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_usage, default:0, rollup:avg), nonempty:true, by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter: dt.entity.cloud_application_instance == "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-858172D5630AFDE7", from: -1h | fieldsAdd metricName = "Kubernetes: Container - CPU usage"
| append[timeseries result = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_throttled, default:0, rollup:avg), nonempty:true, by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter: dt.entity.cloud_application_instance == "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-858172D5630AFDE7", from: -1h | fieldsAdd metricName = "Kubernetes: Container - CPU throttled"]
| append[timeseries result = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.requests_cpu, rollup:avg), by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter: dt.entity.cloud_application_instance == "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-858172D5630AFDE7", from: -1h]
| append[timeseries result = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.limits_cpu, rollup:avg), by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_instance}, filter: dt.entity.cloud_application_instance == "CLOUD_APPLICATION_INSTANCE-858172D5630AFDE7", from: -1h]

timeseries avg(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_usage), by: { k8s.pod.name }, filter: { matchesValue(k8s.namespace.name, "kubearmor") }
| limit 20

| limit 20
